name: Hrvatski sindikat telekomunikacija
membership:
Uni Global Union (www.uniglobalunion.org)
Nezavisni Hrvatski Sindikati (www.nhs.hr)
goal: HST (Croatian Trade Union of telecommunication) is a union organizing workers in ICTS sector in Croatia. Our main goal is negotiation and signing of collective bargaining agreement(s) and protecting and promoting workers right.
interests: Communication, Digital economy and society, Employment and Social Affairs, Research and innovation, Youth
euInitiatives: We are taking part in Advisory Committee on Health and Safety (ACHS) in workers interest group (WIG).
